# Demonstration of Animated Word Cloud

- Prepare a timelapse text data
- and use [AnimatedWordCloud](https://github.com/konbraphat51/AnimatedWordCloud)

If using in local environment; [For Local](animatedwordcloud_local.ipynb)  
If using in Google Colab; [For Colab](animatedwordcloud_colab.ipynb)

The result will be like:
